panoratech/Panora

Open-source unified API for integrating data sources with LLMs

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Open-source data annotation platform for LLM development
  • Open-source platform for evaluating and optimizing LLM apps
  • Open-source framework for building stateful LLM applications
  • Interface for chatting with local LLMs
  • Tool for creating, editing, and exporting fine-tuning datasets for LLMs with document processing and multiple export formats
  • Survey of data-centric methods for LLMs
  • Access multiple LLMs through a unified interface
  • SQL editor with LLM integration and data visualization
  • lets you plug structured knowledge bases into LLMs for efficient, scalable augmentation
  • Open cookbook for building top-tier code LLMs with complete training data and reproducible pipeline
